name: sugaring
content:
sugaring noun [U]
(HAIR REMOVAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a method of removing hair from the body using a thick mixture of sugar, water, and lemon juice that has been heated and then spread on the skin when it has become cool. When it is taken off, the hair is pulled off with it.
